modShortDescription: Now farming time will take a little longer. This 7 Days to Die mod increases crop growth times from 63 minutes a stage to 90 minutes a stage.
modDescription:
Farming growth time in the game is a little short. Now [farming](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-farming/) time will take a little longer. This 7 Days to Die mod increases crop growth times from 63 minutes a stage to 90 minutes a stage.

[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/JaxTeller718/JaxTeller718_Modlets_Stable/tree/master/JaxTeller718_TougherFarming)

If you appreciate JaxTeller718’s work here feel free to use this [donate link](https://www.paypal.me/FrankCirabisiJr) to show support.

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/8098-jaxteller718-modlet-collection/).

**Credits:** [JaxTeller718](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/jaxteller718/)
